panels.description: plot the ratio of node_core_<watts>  (joules / time)  reported by kepler-dev and kepler-latest; i.e dev / latest. In the ideal case, the ratio should be close to 1.0
panels.title: Dev / Latest - core

panels.description:
Top: value of dynamic node_core_watts reported by kepler-dev
Bottom: value of dynamic node_core_watts reported by kepler-latest
plot the ratio of node_platform_watts  (joules / time)  reported by kepler-dev and kepler-latest; i.e dev / latest. In the ideal case, the ratio should be close to 1.0
panels.title: Dev / Latest -  platform

panels.description:
Top: value of idle node_core_watts reported by kepler-dev
Bottom: value of idle node_core_watts reported by kepler-latest

options.content: node - platform
node - package
node - core
node - dram
node - other

targets.expr:
sum by(mode) (rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{job="dev", pid="${process}"}[$__rate_interval]))
/
sum by (mode) (rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{job="latest", pid="${process}"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(mode) (rate(kepler_process_core_joules_total{job="dev", pid="${process}"}[$__rate_interval]))
/
sum by (mode) (rate(kepler_process_core_joules_total{job="latest", pid="${process}"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(mode) (rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{job="dev", pid="${process}"}[$__rate_interval]))
/
sum by (mode) (rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{job="latest", pid="${process}"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(mode) (rate(kepler_process_other_joules_total{job="dev", pid="${process}"}[$__rate_interval]))
/
sum by (mode) (rate(kepler_process_other_joules_total{job="latest", pid="${process}"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Dev / Latest ratio:  cpu cache miss - ${process}
